verbose_text: 25 Additionally, the administration of steroids and corticotropin releasing hormone has been shown to inhibit TNF-alpha and IL-1 while simultaneously reducing NREM sleep, 26 demonstrating at least a possible association between sleep and the release of TNF-alpha and IL-1 as sleep regulating substances.
evidence:
corticotropin-releasing
hormone has been shown to inhibit TNF-alpha and IL-1
